text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 21 and 23 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Paul Chemase ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Julius Chelule ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Irba Lakhal ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 23 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
